properties.body:
WESTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
1. 42 FOOT VESSEL, FOUR PERSONS ON BOARD, TAKING ON WATER
   IN 38-54.32N 050-11.40W AT 301417Z MAY.  VESSELS
   IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
   ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO RCC BOSTON,
   PHONE: 617 223 8555, E-MAIL: RCCBOSTON@USCG.MIL.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 1350/14.
